greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A fourth order generalization of the Mobius function of n.
reference: Compares the exponents of the factors of the canonical prime factorization of n with 4 as detailed in A053864.
link: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := Which[ee = FactorInteger[n][[All, 2]]; AnyTrue[ee, # > 4 &], 0, AnyTrue[ee, # < 4 &], 1, True, (-1)^Length[ee]]; Array[a, 100] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 09 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 08 2000
